bibl.title: Guardians of Letters: Literacy, Power, and the Transmitters of Early Christian Literature.
bibl.note: Inclut une étude de P. Bodmer VII-IX (= van Haelst 557; 548; 138). - Non vidimus.
HAINES-EITZEN Kim, Guardians of Letters: Literacy, Power, and the Transmitters of Early Christian Literature.
Oxford - New York, Oxford University Press, 2000, 8°, xii-212 pp. ISBN 0-19-513564-4. $49.95.
